item.title: Investigation Into Shannon Hercutt’s Death
item.description: In 2009, Shannon Hercutt was found dead in her SUV at the bottom of a cliff in Sevier County, Tennessee. What seemed like an accident was later ruled a staged homicide. Though her father was suspected due to family disputes, police said the killer wasn’t a family member. The case remains unsolved. #truecrime #mystery #unsolved

media:content.media:title: Investigation Into Shannon Hercutt’s Death
media:content.media:description: In 2009, Shannon Hercutt was found dead in her SUV at the bottom of a cliff in Sevier County, Tennessee. What seemed like an accident was later ruled a staged homicide. Though her father was suspected due to family disputes, police said the killer wasn’t a family member. The case remains unsolved. #truecrime #mystery #unsolved

item.title: 17-Year-Old Vanishes After Family Gathering
item.description: Sara Martinez, 17, disappeared overnight after a family gathering in December 2024. Her bedroom window was found open, she took only her backpack, phone, and makeup, and has not been heard from since. #disappearance #missingperson #mystery

item.description: In 2003, Eric Nelams was tragically killed in his driveway. Investigators suspect the attack was planned raising questions about whether someone close to him was involved.

item.title: Conrad Gowan Murder Investigation
item.description: Conrad Gowan was killed in his Jamesport, NY home in March 2024. Authorities are searching for his girlfriend, Majorie Quarrie, who is wanted in connection with the stabbing.
